item.title: Npc Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Trying to make npc dialogue’s but i cant get it to work. I’m using GoogleScape V 1.8. Here are my codes by the for npc talking case 1339: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Welcome To L33tPkScape!", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue...", 4886); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 1340: sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Would you like to go to Tutorial Island?", 2460); sendFrame126("Yes, Please!", 2461); sendFrame126("No, Thank you.", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;
Then here are the codes for first click npc } else if (NPCID == 2244) { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 1339; } else if (NPCID == 2244) { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; NpcWanneTalk = 1340;
And then finally here are the two codes under case 40 || NpcDialogue == 1339 || NpcDialogue == 1340 Do i need anything else?
